Package com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css

Class BorderRightColor

java.lang.Object
com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<BorderRightColor>
com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.BorderRightColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
CssProperty, StateChangeInformer<Bean>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class BorderRightColor
extends AbstractCssProperty<BorderRightColor>
implements StateChangeInformer<Bean>
 border-right-color: color|transparent|initial|inherit;

 The border-right-color property sets the color of an element's right border.

 Note: Always declare the border-style property before the border-right-color property. An element must have borders before you can change the color.
 Default value:  black
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS1
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.borderRightColor="blue"
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
Serialized Form
